definition: A term referring to the fine strands of hair found on the upper part of the body, specifically on the back of the neck. It is commonly used to describe the sensation or physical reaction when these hairs stand on end due to fear, surprise, or intense emotions.

examples.german: Sie hatte Gänsehaut bis in die Nackenhaare.
examples.english: She had goosebumps all the way up her neck.

examples.german: Das kalte Wasser ließ seine Nackenhaare zu Berge stehen.
examples.english: The cold water made his neck hairs stand on end.

examples.german: Er bekam eine Gänsehaut bis in die Nackenhaare.
examples.english: He got goosebumps all the way up his neck.

examples.german: Bei dieser gruseligen Geschichte stellen sich einem die Nackenhaare auf.
examples.english: This creepy story makes your neck hairs stand on end.
